title: Anyone up for Creating a Team for the Tournament?

embed.description: Hey guys and girls! Why not grab you and 4 mates and enter the Oceanic LOL Cup! Entry is the $25 per team and you could win $500 RP! Here's what you need to know :D. Details - The Oceanic LoL Cup is a competition being hosted by Oceanic LoL on Facebook.

body:
Link to that Post is above.
Just wondering, I'm surely interested in it, just aint got no one to play with. Let me know if you are interested :3

replies.body:
Go on Homura!
Make a team and boss them around cause you carry them.

^Hahaha made me laugh. 

Sart bb I'll make you Team Captain. Your leadership skills are paramount to our team's success.

Yeah Teradactyal it'd be pretty neat wouldn't it.
i need that money b0ss. money= pussi b0ss
I'm entering, you could have a chance to kick my positive bottom live on stream babyyyyy
I'm tempted to enter just for this.

Do it!!
Come on let's all compete.

Will be GD rivalry again, but played out on the battle field!
I would like to join a team for this.
bunch of silver nubs wasting their money thinking they might win ;o

> [{quoted}](name=Arclight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=a1AtHraG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-06T03:31:20.097+0000)
>
> bunch of silver nubs wasting their money thinking they might win ;o

OC bb don't be that wayyy <3

Or it could just be fun to play against others team with your mates.
Almost like a small 5 week sporting season.
$5 a game per team isn't that bad, and to get to test your team work under pressure.

Why shouldn't our community get to compete in local tournaments.
